section.title: SUPPRESS
section.p: The user can specify a list of signals which to be eliminated by Boolean simplification of the final behavioral description.
It is possible to use the wildcard '*' as for signal renaming.

section.title: SENSITIVE
section.p: This directive is useful in the case of functional abstraction with timing information. The user can specify a list of bussed signals for which the most precise timed behavioral model will be used. This is only required for certain critical signals.
It is possible to use the wildcard '*' as for signal renaming.
